chunk:
Sodashi Clay Cleanser with Lime

Brand: Sodashi

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: aqua (purified water), macadamia integrifolia (macadamia oil), prunus armeniaca (apricot kernel oil), prunus dulcis (almond oil), cetearyl alcohol (plant derived), olea europaea (olive leaf extract), simmondsia chinensis (jojoba oil), kaolin, tocopherol (vitami

, tocopherol (vitamin E), citrus grandis (grapefruit seed extract), xanthan gum, citrus aurantifolia (lime*), potassium sorbate

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
